cab.content: Military Secret.J^l^^ent is the ftro^tv 6f342a'rom Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,IMi September 191.9.(Received 20th.) 12787. Malleson wires 17th. September : -. " Satnarekand agent writes 27th August. Local garrison about 800 (? cavalry), six guns, ten machine guns. Also 400 disarmed Austrian prisoners regarded as suspects by Bolsheviks." 2. Bokhara Mullahs are privately preaching against Bolsheviks." 3. Twenty Indian merchants applied to Bolsheviks for passes to return to India via (? Bokhara). On pass being refused they started secretly, but soon returned as they were attacked by (corrupt group)s, two of them killed, and about one million roubles stolen from them."
